com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform

Class CloudPlatformAccessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.CloudPlatformAccessor

  • public final class CloudPlatformAccessor
extends Object
    Accessor class for information related to the current cloud platform.

    • Method Summary
